name: rotation_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the rotation function of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the rotation function.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to set for the rotation function.

parameters.name: rotationAngle
parameters.description: The angle at which the device should rotate.
